name: Com_Pute
description:
COM_PUTE - Wowie Jam 2.0!

Play the Bug, destroy the Computer.

Don't wait! Jump-in to destroy every component in your path! But watch out, you don't wanna run out of memory or even make a power surge. Who knows what a little dragonfly can do to a computer nowadays. Watch out for the new generation of CPU, it can destroy you!

Controls:
WASD = Move
Left click = Select/shoot.

Game Jam's Topic : Intentionnal bugs.

01 - INSTALLATION
=================

 • Extract the "Com_Pute v1.0" folder anyware.
 • Launch the .exe file.

 
02 - TROUBLESHOOT:
=================

• Windows might think that the game is harmfull, I assure that you can run the game without any damage by pressing the run button or disabling windows SmartScreen.
• Be sure to connect your computer to a power outlet if you're using a laptop.
• Be sure to have your latest graphic driver, it can cause visual issues if you run only on your integrated graphics.
• If the game is laggy, be sure to remove visual FX from the title menu for a better experience. (The game was developed with visual FX in mind).

03 - DEVELOPER NOTES:
=================

• I was not able to do everything I wanted with this game but I think that I made it work well and that the core is there. If you want a bit more I can look further to do an update.
• I know that the integrated circuit makes a bit no sense, but it's a game eh?

Carrd: https://glitchydust.carrd.co/

-- --

♥ Luv from GlitchyDust ♥

-- --

//The jam was on 2020-01-17 to 2020-01-19.
